io.scanbot.sdk.persistence

Interface PageStorage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomDraftPageStorage, CustomPageStorage, DraftPageStorage, InternalDraftPageStorage, InternalPageStorage, PageStorageBase

    public PageStorage

    Interface providing easy methods to work with Page image objects
